text: Pardis Ahmadiyeh (; born 29 June 1992 in Tehran) is an Iranian actress who has been active since 2006 with acting in cinema and television series. She played her first leading role in a film in Red Nail Polish (film). == Personal life == She holds a bachelor's degree in music.http://www.wikinaz.ir/post/1250/%D8%A8%DB%8C%D9%88%DA%AF%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%81%DB%8C-%DA%A9%D8%A7%D9%85%D9%84-%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%DB%8C%D8%B3-%D8%A7%D8%AD%D9%85%D8%AF%DB%8C%D9%87-%D8%B9%DA%A9%D8%B3-%D9%87%D8%A7%DB%8C-%D8%AC%D8%AF.html == filmography == === Cinema === {| class="wikitable" |- !
